Package io.github.maze11.screens

Class BaseMenuScreen

java.lang.Object
io.github.maze11.screens.BaseMenuScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameOverScreen, MenuScreen, WinScreen
public abstract class BaseMenuScreen extends Object implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
Abstract base class for menu screens (MenuScreen, GameOverScreen, WinScreen). Handles common functionality: font generation, stage setup, viewport scaling. Reduces code duplication across menu screens.
